mapper.select: SELECT A.CHCK_FLFMT_HSTRY_ID, A.OBSVTR_ID, TO_CHAR(A.CHCK_FLFMT_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CHCK_FLFMT_DAY, A.CHCK_FLFR_ID, M.NM AS CHCK_FLFR_NM, COALESCE(RF.RF_OBSVTR_CD, WL.WL_OBSVTR_CD, FM.OBSVTR_CD) AS OBSVTR_CD, COALESCE(RF.RF_OBSVTR_NM, WL.WL_OBSVTR_NM, FM.OBSVTR_NM) AS OBSVTR_NM FROM TEMP3.TBL_OBSVTR_EQPMNT_CHCK_FLFMT_HSTRY A JOIN TEMP3.TBL_MBR M ON M.MBR_ID = A.CHCK_FLFR_ID LEFT JOIN TEMP3.TBL_RF_OBSVTR RF ON RF.RF_OBSVTR_ID = A.OBSVTR_ID LEFT JOIN TEMP3.TBL_WL_OBSVTR WL ON WL.WL_OBSVTR_ID = A.OBSVTR_ID LEFT JOIN TEMP3.TBL_FM_OBSVTR FM ON FM.FM_OBSVTR_ID = A.OBSVTR_ID ORDER BY A.CHCK_FLFMT_DAY DESC

SELECT A.*, C.CHCK_ARTCL_NM, B.CHCK_RSLT, B.RMRK FROM ( SELECT A.CHCK_FLFMT_HSTRY_ID, A.OBSVTR_ID, TO_CHAR(A.CHCK_FLFMT_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CHCK_FLFMT_DAY, A.CHCK_FLFR_ID, M.NM AS CHCK_FLFR_NM FROM TEMP3.TBL_OBSVTR_EQPMNT_CHCK_FLFMT_HSTRY A JOIN TEMP3.TBL_MBR M ON A.CHCK_FLFR_ID = M.MBR_ID ) A JOIN TEMP3.TBL_OBSVTR_EQPMNT_CHCK_RSLT B ON B.CHCK_FLFMT_HSTRY_ID = A.CHCK_FLFMT_HSTRY_ID JOIN TEMP3.TBL_OBSVTR_EQPMNT_CHCK_ARTCL C ON C.CHCK_ARTCL_ID = B.CHCK_ARTCL_ID WHERE A.CHCK_FLFMT_HSTRY_ID = #{hstryCode}::uuid

SELECT A.CHCK_FLFMT_HSTRY_ID, A.OBSVTR_ID, TO_CHAR(A.CHCK_FLFMT_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CHCK_FLFMT_DAY, A.CHCK_FLFR_ID, M.NM AS CHCK_FLFR_NM FROM TEMP3.TBL_OBSVTR_EQPMNT_CHCK_FLFMT_HSTRY A JOIN TEMP3.TBL_MBR M ON A.CHCK_FLFR_ID = M.MBR_ID where A.CHCK_FLFMT_HSTRY_ID= #{hstryCode}::uuid

WITH CTE AS ( SELECT A.CHCK_FLFMT_HSTRY_ID, A.OBSVTR_ID, A.CHCK_FLFMT_DAY, A.CHCK_FLFR_ID, M.NM AS CHCK_FLFR_NM, B.CHCK_ARTCL_ID, B.CHCK_RSLT, B.RMRK, COALESCE(RF.RF_OBSVTR_CD, WL.WL_OBSVTR_CD, FM.OBSVTR_CD) AS OBSVTR_CD, COALESCE(RF.RF_OBSVTR_NM, WL.WL_OBSVTR_NM, FM.OBSVTR_NM) AS OBSVTR_NM FROM TEMP3.TBL_OBSVTR_EQPMNT_CHCK_FLFMT_HSTRY A JOIN TEMP3.TBL_OBSVTR_EQPMNT_CHCK_RSLT B ON B.CHCK_FLFMT_HSTRY_ID = A.CHCK_FLFMT_HSTRY_ID JOIN TEMP3.TBL_MBR M ON M.MBR_ID = A.CHCK_FLFR_ID LEFT JOIN TEMP3.TBL_RF_OBSVTR RF ON RF.RF_OBSVTR_ID = A.OBSVTR_ID LEFT JOIN TEMP3.TBL_WL_OBSVTR WL ON WL.WL_OBSVTR_ID = A.OBSVTR_ID LEFT JOIN TEMP3.TBL_FM_OBSVTR FM ON FM.FM_OBSVTR_ID = A.OBSVTR_ID ) SELECT CT.*, D.CHCK_ARTCL_NM AS CHCK_ARTCL_NM, D.CHCK_ARTCL_ID AS CHCK_ARTCL_ID, D.CHCK_ARTCL_GUIDE AS CHCK_ARTCL_GUIDE, D.OBSVTR_TYPE AS OBSVTR_TYPE FROM CTE CT, TEMP3.TBL_OBSVTR_EQPMNT_CHCK_ARTCL D WHERE CT. D.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY CT.CHCK_FLFMT_DAY DESC

WITH CTE AS ( SELECT A.CHCK_FLFMT_HSTRY_ID, A.OBSVTR_ID, A.CHCK_FLFMT_DAY, A.CHCK_FLFR_ID, M.NM AS CHCK_FLFR_NM, B.CHCK_ARTCL_ID, B.CHCK_RSLT, B.RMRK, COALESCE(RF.RF_OBSVTR_CD, WL.WL_OBSVTR_CD, FM.OBSVTR_CD) AS OBSVTR_CD, COALESCE(RF.RF_OBSVTR_NM, WL.WL_OBSVTR_NM, FM.OBSVTR_NM) AS OBSVTR_NM FROM TEMP3.TBL_OBSVTR_EQPMNT_CHCK_FLFMT_HSTRY A JOIN TEMP3.TBL_OBSVTR_EQPMNT_CHCK_RSLT B ON B.CHCK_FLFMT_HSTRY_ID = A.CHCK_FLFMT_HSTRY_ID JOIN TEMP3.TBL_MBR M ON M.MBR_ID = A.CHCK_FLFR_ID LEFT JOIN TEMP3.TBL_RF_OBSVTR RF ON RF.RF_OBSVTR_ID = A.OBSVTR_ID LEFT JOIN TEMP3.TBL_WL_OBSVTR WL ON WL.WL_OBSVTR_ID = A.OBSVTR_ID LEFT JOIN TEMP3.TBL_FM_OBSVTR FM ON FM.FM_OBSVTR_ID = A.OBSVTR_ID ) SELECT CT.*, D.CHCK_ARTCL_NM AS CHCK_ARTCL_NM, D.CHCK_ARTCL_ID AS CHCK_ARTCL_ID, D.CHCK_ARTCL_GUIDE AS CHCK_ARTCL_GUIDE, D.OBSVTR_TYPE AS OBSVTR_TYPE, D.REG_DT AS REG_DT, D.RGTR_ID AS RGTR_ID, D.MDFCN_DT AS MDFCN_DT, D.MDFR_ID AS MDFR_ID FROM CTE CT, TEMP3.TBL_OBSVTR_EQPMNT_CHCK_ARTCL D WHERE D.OBSVTR_TYPE = #{type} AND
CT.CHCK_FLFMT_DAY > TO_TIMESTAMP(#{startDate},'MM/DD/YYYY') AND CT.CHCK_FLFMT_DAY <= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{endDate},'MM/DD/YYYY') AND
D.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY CT.CHCK_FLFMT_DAY DESC
